english.segment1: This is a time to come and worship. And it is a time to worship you
english.segment2: And we lay all of our burdens down. Down at your feet. Because you are our creator. You are our God and king
english.segment3: This is a time we open up our eyes. To see you to see you as you are
english.segment4: And you are all that I could ask for. My holy redeemer. God you are my master. You are my God and king
english.segment5: This is a time to come and worship. And it is a time to worship you
english.segment6: And we lay all of our burdens down. Down at your feet. Because you are our creator. You are our God and king
english.segment7: This is a time we open up our eyes. To see you to see you as you are
english.segment8: And you are all that I could ask for. My holy redeemer. God you are my master. You are my God and king
english.segment9: And we sing. Sing it all to you. And we sing. Sing it all to you. And we sing. Sing it all to you. We praise you. And we praise you. Praise your holy name. . And we lay all of our burdens down. Down at your feet. Because you are our creator. You are our God and king
english.segment10: You are all that I could ask for. My holy redeemer. God you are my master. You are my God and king
english.segment11: You are my God and king. Your are our God and king
